forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny, with a high near 63. West wind around 15 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 50. Southwest wind 2 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco, the afternoon light bathes the city in a gentle embrace, showcasing vibrant hues beneath a vast, mostly sunny sky. The high temperature nudges near 63, complemented by a westward breeze that dances lightly through streets, playfully tousling hair and stirring the remnants of spring blossoms. The vista promises clarity, with no veils of fog nearby, allowing those iconic landmarks to shine— the Golden Gate Bridge standing proud against the horizon, a sleek silhouette against the backdrop of the bay.

As the sun sets, the air will cool, settling into a low around 50, providing a pleasant respite and an invitation to gather outside in the cozy evening light. With winds softening to a subtle whisper from the southwest, it is a perfect time to embrace a layered wardrobe; a light jacket will serve as a friend against the evening chill while offering comfort during twilight strolls along the waterfront. As the day melds into night, the city beckons for leisurely pursuits—perhaps indulging in a quiet café on a sun-drenched terrace or wandering through the streets with a book in hand, letting the brisk air and soft sounds of the city wrap you in its unique San Francisco charm.
